about_the_game:
Add “Blue Monday” (Synth Riders version) by Zardonic (feat. REEBZ) to your library!

Song Description:

Add “Blue Monday” (Synth Riders version) by Zardonic (feat. REEBZ) to your library!

This classic from electronic music pioneers New Order is given Zardonic’s signature heavy EDM treatment, with rocking drums and guitar, blended with EDM and lashings of retro synths over REEBZ’ vocals. Made specifically for Synth Riders, expect a heavy new twist on an old favorite.

Music Pack Description:

Synth Riders goes “Back to the Synths” to celebrate 5 years of riding the rails with the “Synthwave Essentials Volume 3” music pack! Headlined by The Midnight, this 10 song pack (5 free songs, 5 paid DLC) also features a brand new cover of New Order’s classic “Blue Monday”, created just for Synth Riders by legendary DJ Zardonic! Also in the pack are tracks and remixes featuring Starcadian, GoST, Ollie Wride, Dance With The Dead, Scandroid, LeBrock and PRIZM. Enjoy these great tracks in “Back to the Synths”, one of our original play Stages which has received a special “glow-up” to coincide with our birthday!

Here is the full track list:
  • “Jason” by The Midnight (feat. Nikki Flores)
  • “Sunset” by The Midnight
  • “Blue Monday” (Synth Riders version) by Zardonic (feat. REEBZ)
  • “New Cydonia” by Starcadian (feat. Hayley)
  • “Behemoth” (Perturbator Remix) by GoST

Free songs:
  • “A Matter of Time” by Ollie Wride
  • “Sledge” by Dance With The Dead
  • “Rendezvous” (VHS Dreams Remix) by Scandroid
  • “Interstellar” by LeBrock
  • “We Were Young” by PRIZM
